column1: 8 pts - You identified production as a business function that could benefit from scrum/sprint methodologies, but it is somewhat unlikely to benefit from it. Good effort in explaining the process.
8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. Good effort, but try to focus more on explaining how scrum/sprint could operate for the chosen business function.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining the poor fit of kanban for production, but it could be more specific and clear. Keep up the good work!

10/10

Great job identifying the production function as a suitable area for implementing kanban methodologies. Your explanation of the possible columns in the kanban board was clear and well-thought-out. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job explaining the process and its benefits for the business function. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Overly general description of poor fit; not specific to this function.

Comment: Your explanation of the poor fit of scrum/sprint is quite general. Please provide more specific details related to the function you chose.

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying the availability bias and providing suggestions to avoid falling into its trap. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Right idea for definition, but some vagueness or illogic. Your description of availability bias is on the right track, but it could be clearer and more concise. Good suggestions for avoiding the bias. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Complete and clear description of possible problem. Great job on providing detailed explanations and examples for the different methodologies and their applications. Keep up the good work!
10/10 - Great job! Your understanding of the methodologies and their application is impressive. Keep up the good work!
